attributes.action: Ban all forms of alcohol advertising.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to the alarming increase in alcohol related illnesses, especially amongst young people, we feel it is time that alcohol is portrayed correctly as a dangerous drug, not a harmless beverage. Health issues aside, how can the Government allow the promotion of a substance which causes death on the roads, violence in the home, mayhem in our towns and misery to the growing number of addicts?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
